channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Ubuntu Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Ubuntu Server

item.title: CVE-2019-0816|2024-08-04T17:58:58.447Z -- microsoft -- ubuntu%20server
item.description: A security feature bypass exists in Azure SSH Keypairs, due to a change in the provisioning logic for some Linux images that use cloud-init, aka 'Azure SSH Keypairs Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability'.
